title: The Good Life Wholefood Restaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Buffet, Salad bar, English
description: Family-friendly coffee shop and restaurant providing buffet style vegetarian and vegan dishes prepared daily using a combination of locally-sourced, organic, and fair trade produce. selection of salads in addition to oven baked jacket potatos, hot dishes like lasagna, lentil bakes, nut roasts, soups, plus desserts. Busy at lunch time. The staff is helpful to offer advice regarding special dietary requirements.
